actionCalls.description: Send Email to Plant Team Member whenever the status - 'In Approval'
actionCalls.name: Send_Email_to_Plant_Team_Member_Enorica_InApproval

value.stringValue: New Lab Sample Order {!$Record.OrderNumber} has been submitted.

Dear Colleague,


Kindly be informed that the new LAB Sample Order {!$Record.OrderNumber} has been submitted.


Order Details

Order ID: {!$Record.OrderNumber}
Ship To: {!$Record.Ship_To_Account__r.Name}
Product: {!BulletDescriptions}
Owner: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}


Link to Sample Order in mySalesforce:

{!$Record.OrderNumber}


Best regards,

Your CRM Support Team


This message was automatically generated by the mySalesforce system.

actionCalls.name: Send_Email_to_Plant_Team_Members_S4
actionCalls.label: Send Email to Plant Team Members

value.stringValue:
Dear Colleague,

Kindly be informed that the new Sample Order {!$Record.OrderNumber} has been sent for dispatching by your team.


Order Details

Order ID:{!$Record.OrderNumber}
SAP ID:{!$Record.SAP_Order_ID__c}
Ship To:{!$Record.Ship_To_Account__r.Name}
Products:{!BulletDescriptions}
Owner:{!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}


Link to Sample Order in mySalesforce:

{!$Record.OrderNumber}

Best regards,

Your CRM Support Team

This is an automatically generated message from the mySalesforce system.

actionCalls.name: Send_Email_to_Plant_Team_Members_ZCRM
actionCalls.label: Send Email to Plant Team Members

value.stringValue:
Dear Colleague,

Kindly note that the CRM sample request has been approved. You can now start processing the order.

Request Details:

Order ID: {!$Record.OrderNumber}
Account: {!$Record.Account.Name}
Shipping Address: {!$Record.ShippingStreet},
{!$Record.ShippingCity},
{!$Record.ShippingCountry},
{!$Record.ShippingPostalCode}
Owner: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}

Order Items:

{!OrderItemTableRows}
Products Quantity

Link to Sample Order in mySalesforce:

{!$Record.OrderNumber}

Best regards,
Your CRM Support Team

The mySalesforce system automatically generated this message.

actionCalls.description: Send Email to Ship to Contact for ZPLS and ZSLS
actionCalls.name: Send_Email_to_Ship_to_Contact
actionCalls.label: Send Email to Ship to Contact

value.stringValue: Your Sample Request {!$Record.OrderNumber} has been processed

Dear {!$Record.ShipToContact.Salutation} {!$Record.ShipToContact.FirstName},

Synthomer has processed your request {!$Record.OrderNumber} for the below Product Material Sample(s).


Please find attached detailed information about the Order.


The following Tracking Information is now available:

Product NameShipping DateTracking URL
{!BulletDescriptions}{!BulletShippingDate}{!BulletTrackingURL}

Regulatory and compliance information can be found via our website. As a member of the Chemical Industries Association and American Chemistry Council, Synthomer embraces the principles of Responsible Care, the chemical industry’s commitment to continual improvement in health, occupational, process and product safety, and environmental performance. We encourage safe and responsible material handling for employees, customers, the public, and for the environment.

If you have further questions, a Synthomer Polymer Expert would be glad to assist you.

Thank you for your interest.

{!$Record.CreatedBy.FirstName} {!$Record.CreatedBy.LastName}

Team Synthomer

Synthomer takes data privacy seriously. Please read the Fair Processing Notice referred to in our Privacy Policy to learn more.

This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named person. If you are not the named addressee you are not allowed to disseminate, distribute or copy this E-Mail. Please notify the sender immediately by E-Mail if you have received this E-Mail by mistake and delete this E-Mail from your system. E-Mail transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or error-free. The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of E-Mail transmission. If verification is required please request a hard-copy version.

actionCalls.name: Send_Email_to_Ship_to_Contact_ZCRM

value.stringValue: Your Sample Request {!$Record.OrderNumber} has been processed

Dear {!$Record.ShipToContact.Salutation} {!$Record.ShipToContact.FirstName},

Synthomer has processed your request {!$Record.OrderNumber} for the below Product Material Sample(s).

Please find attached detailed information about the Order.

The following Tracking Information is now available:

Shipping Carrier: {!$Record.Shipping_Carrier__c}

Product NameShipping DateTracking Number
{!BulletDescriptions}{!BulletShippingDate}{!BulletTrackingNumber}

Regulatory and compliance information can be found via our website. As a member of the Chemical Industries Association and American Chemistry Council, Synthomer embraces the principles of Responsible Care, the chemical industry’s commitment to continual improvement in health, occupational, process and product safety, and environmental performance. We encourage safe and responsible material handling for employees, customers, the public, and for the environment.

If you have further questions, a Synthomer Polymer Expert would be glad to assist you.

Thank you for your interest.

{!$Record.CreatedBy.FirstName} {!$Record.CreatedBy.LastName}
Team Synthomer

Synthomer takes data privacy seriously. Please read the Fair Processing Notice referred to in our Privacy Policy to learn more.
This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named person. If you are not the named addressee you are not allowed to disseminate, distribute or copy this E-Mail. Please notify the sender immediately by E-Mail if you have received this E-Mail by mistake and delete this E-Mail from your system. E-Mail transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or error-free. The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of E-Mail transmission. If verification is required please request a hard-copy version.

Flow.description: Order - Sample Order Notification - Refer CRM Sample Order Notification

formulas.description: Display each product description clearly on a separate line.
formulas.name: BulletDescriptions
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!var_OLIDescriptions}), "-", SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( {!var_OLIDescriptions}, "[", "" ), "]", "" ), ",", BR() ) )

formulas.name: BulletShippingDate

formulas.description: Display each tracking number clearly on a separate line.
formulas.name: BulletTrackingNumber
BulletTrackingURL

formulas.description: formula created to tag Owner and created by in chatter post. If both are same - tag owner. else tag both
